title: Self-balancing smart suitcase follows you around
text:
Self-balancing smart suitcase follows you around 2:06am EST - 01:23 
The latest so-called smart suitcase, that's a suitcase that follows you around, has only two wheels and auto-balancing technology and a price yet to be announced. Stuart McDill reports.
